resources.string: We need to access your camera and storage to show this feature. Pwease grant?
Text cannot be empty, please input something
This is an error message. There are many errors in this world but this one is unique because it has only one eyes. Prepare for the holy feast and say your prayers.
A warning message\'s job is to warn your about the impending occurrence. Sometimes it is negligible, other times it is quite dangerous.
I am here to inform you about the information that is not relevant to any other information that you have received throughout your journey.
